column4: rmr: I am relatively new to ubuntu, and linux in general, but believe me, I have been through the frustration phase.  Still there are things I don't know how to do, like anything, but I can get the help now.
I've been using Ubuntu for a while
I've seen the backwards stuff for too long to just stay quiet about it.... I've read the Linux Journal articles and sadly, they're 100% right
and I feel bad about it. I want Ubuntu to be the Linux people always wanted. I've been hearing "year of the Linux desktop" for like 2 decades and it never happens
